amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Amendment SA 1465 under the order of 12/16/2011, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 89 - 10. Record Vote Number: 232.
Amendment SA 1465 proposed by Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S8748-8749) In the nature of a substitute.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1465 proposed by Senator Reid.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1465 under the order of 12/16/2011, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 89 - 10. Record Vote Number: 232.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1465 under the order of 12/16/2011, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 89 - 10. Record Vote Number: 232.
